item.title: Aanchal Arora
item.description: It was a dream to be able to serve the society.

item.title: Amit Harit
item.description: Wanted to be a part of a small genuine organisation which focused more on delivery than quantity.

item.title: Ananta Pishen
item.description: A zeal to connect and grow and help others in the same process.

item.title: Anmol Jain
item.description: Be it on educational grounds or recreational activities, it is tremendously fun and enriching to interact and learn with kids.

item.title: Avanindra Singh
item.description: I joined Adhiyagya because I wanted to gain some experience of managing kids .

item.title: Darshan kumari
item.description: I wanted to do social service since very long.As soon as I came to know abt Adhyyagya, I attended 1 class & found the real place to make effords It’s a very honest & caring organisation.

item.title: Disha Katia
item.description: To give back to the society! Special Moment One of my stufents called and conversed with me in english- was a very proud moment- encouraging me to continue going!

item.title: Dr. Sunanda Ghosh Dastidar
item.description: Want to give back to society and enrich my own life by being of help to young children.

item.title: Manas Anand
item.description: Adhiyagya to me has been a platform to not only let explore my social personality but also to return to the society in the best way I can, in the smallest of my capacities, that is, by the gift of imparting education.

item.title: Meenakshi Rawat
item.description: In order to educate the needy so that they can stand up on their feet and be financially independent

item.title: MRITYUNJAY SMRITI
item.description: To help in Contributing towards EWS Children welfare and Educational development

item.title: Piyush Arora
item.description: I always wanted to help in the education field and I was introduced to Adhiyagya by a good friend.

item.title: Ritu bohra
item.description: I was searching for something more fruitful and which gave me a sense of fulfillment.

item.title: Shreshtha Gupta
item.description: I always wanted to join an organisation where I know I am helping someone from the ground level, and Adhiyagya is that platform for me.

item.title: Siddhi
item.description: I always wanted to do something for poor children Special Moment When the kids did very well in their test and we played a game as their reward

item.title: Surbhi gupta
item.description: The greatest gift one can give to the society is the gift of knowledge.

item.title: Tanvi Pandita
item.description: I joined Adhiyagya out of my curiosity and hope to do something worthwile with my life, to connect more with people and get myself to learn more.

item.title: Tushaar Mehta
item.description: Our lives revolve revolve around ourselves and the people we are attached to.

item.title: Vikrant Rai
item.description: First thing is I like to teach, specially to the kids as they help me become more imaginative at certain concepts.

item.title: Vivek Agarwal
item.description: I joined Adhiyagya by chance through family friends but never been able to get away from it.
